title: The whole booke of Iob paraphrased or, made easie for any to understand. By George Abbott.
author: Abbot, George, 1604-1649.
publisher: Printed by Edward Griffin for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shop at the entrance into Popes-head-alley, out of Lumbard-street,
notes: With the original Bible text in English.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
